title: Trees have Leaves!
summary: A fundamental fact about trees: we can always pick out a leaf in a tree of order at least 2.

title: Trees have n-1 Edges
summary: Another fundamental fact about trees: they can't have too many edges... or too little...

title: Characterizing Infinite Dimensional Vector Spaces (LADR 2A/17)
summary: This exercise from Axler's Linear Algebra Done Right 4e gives a useful way to characterize infinite dimensional vector spaces.
